Favorite place in #Copenhagen so far = Torvehallerne Market. Seriously a Fit Foodie DREAM. It's an indoor/outdoor market where you can get specialty items, meat/fish, produce, fresh bread/pastries, etc. It's open every day...and we'll definitely be back! Since @DaFunkShow and I are spending a full 4 days here, we picked up 2 bottles of wine, a loaf of fresh bread, cheese, eggs, potatoes, an onion, berries, and some bananas (all the breakfast essentials)! #FitFoodieTravels #Denmark #ActiveTravel #Berries #FarmersMarket #Torvehallerne

De openbare ruimte is hier van de mensen en dat nodigt uit voor ontmoeting. Good morning Copenhagen.  Torvehallerne is a buzzing food hall smack-bang in the city centre of Copenhagen. Close to the busy NÃ¸rreport Street and the pristine lakes, itâ€™s the perfect place where you can grab a handful of delicious treatsÂ to watch the sun go downÂ on popular Dronning Louises Bridge.  Torvehallerne is not a supermarket - it is a super market. At this beautiful food market, you will find over 60 stands selling everything from fresh fish and meat to gourmet chocolate and exotic spices, as well as small places where you can have a quick bite to eat.

Mikkeller Haven brewed by De Proefbrouwerij. Copenhagen, Denmark. (Brewery is located in Belgium. Quiet weird ingo found on net). This beer I found at beer shop at Torvehallerne in Copenhagen. Beer looks like something local but if it is? I'm not sure about it.  Golden-orange color pilsner. Aroma and flavour quiet hoppy and  sweet with bit of flower touch. Medium carbonation and bitterness. Very easy to drink.  Aroma 6.5/10 Taste 6.5/10 Can 0.5 L Alcohol 4.6% Price 30 DKK (4 euro) - not sure about correct price.  #beer #beerporn #beertography #Ã¸l #sÃ¶r #piwo #pivo #cerveza #biera #bier #review #reviewer  #beerstagraming #pilsner #pils #brewery #bryggeri #kbh #haven #copenhagen #mikkeller #torvehallerne #deproefbrouwerij  @mikkellerbeer @torvehallernekbh

The Confit de canard (or pulled duck/confit duck) sandwich at Ma Poule in Torvehallerne has been making waves, ever since they opened. Itâ€™s famed - and for good reason. Next we headed to the walking/shopping street StrÃ¸get via the incredible food market Torvehallerne for last minute shopping. SmÃ¸rrebrÃ¸d (I was told it is pronounce as 'smuhr-broht') or open-face sandwich is truly a unique Danish food experience. Typically rye bread is used and you can have limitless different toppings & garnishes. These were freshly made and beautifully presented. I went with the meatballs, potato salad, onions & chives topping. Delish! This food market @torvehallernekbh where I had tasted this national dish is a must-go place when in Copenhagen especially you foodies out there! #ArtOnAPlate

Last but definitely not least we had hazelnuts from Piemonte with myseost (Norwegian type of sweet brown cheese) and biodynamic hay milk. Everything just came together and complemented each other in this dish. The milk foam was light, pure, and fresh, the myseost was sweet, caramelly, and creamy, and the hazelnuts gave a good crunch and another lovely taste to finish off a great evening. #magasinetlÃ¦kkerier #sÃ¸llerÃ¸dkro #copenhagencooking #copenhagen #kÃ¸benhavn #torvehallerne #dessertaften #hazelnuts #hasselnÃ¸dder #piemonte #myseost #hÃ¸mÃ¦lk #haymilk #lastbutnotleast #canilicktheplate #mÃ¥manslikketallerkenen

Last year I made a foodie  pilgrimmage to #copenhagen a place which has to be near the top of any foodies travel list. Copenhagen  of course is awash with #michelinstar restaurants and much like in the past when I got my picture taken at many a famous monument this  picture for me outside #noma was the equivalent of the  picture I had in Italy at the #trevifountain or the #spanishsteps at 21 and equally as  exciting, oh how my world  has changed.  Now I  don't have a Michelin star budget  so I  never got to dine at Noma  but I  didn't miss out because  Copenhagen has some fantastic  markets, #torvehallerne is a rival to the #englishmarketcork, there is the Disney land of food tourism experiences at @copenhagenstreetfood on #papiroen beside @nomacph and endless food experiences at the meat packing district.  With organic  food and  sourdough products everywhere. I  even had organic sourdough  pizza at #mothercopenhagen now that's what I'm talking about. I have  tonnes of footage, from which I'm fashioning a YouTube video but I am going to start instagramming some of the content so stay tuned and follow this feed If it is of interest to you.@copenhagenstreetfood #vistcopenhagen #tasteofireland #danishfood #denmark #irishblogger #irishfoodbloggers #irishfoodblogger @visitcopenhagen #copenhagen

Casual hotdog munching and people watching. #torvehallerne #farmersmarket #independentshops
My favourite place in the city has to be the Torvehallerne; a buzzing food market set within two glass houses. One half houses the rawer of ingredients; fresh fish on ice, local meats and cold cuts, bread, cheese and there is a nut stall I am rather fond of which does spectacular things like chocolate coated pecans and walnuts. Over in the other glass house sit the cafes and lunch-time places; there is a popular porridge spot in the corner, a very good coffee stall, about three places that serve glugg (mulled wine but richer in Nordic spice), half a dozen vibrant sandwich and salad stalls and a constantly busy fish cake stand offering wooden spoons of the delicious stuff dipped in fresh tartar sauce. After sampling one of everything we settled on two boxes of the brightest salads made with locally sourced ingredients, a whole smoked mackerel and two thick slices of nutty rye. . . . . #cophenhagenlife #copenhagen #hygge #torvehallerne #travelphotography #travelersnotebook #lifeslittlestories  #landandsea  #lifeandthyme #theartofslowliving  #momentsofmine  #foodstyling #thatsdarling #verilymoment #momentsofmine #darlingweekend #DarlingMovement  #darlingdaily #theprettycities #photostory #photoessay #keepitwild #sustainableliving #welivetoexplore #behomefree #slowmorning #onthetable #gatheringslikethese #forahappymoment #instafood
#torvehallerne #copenhagen

SPICE SPECIALIST  â€¢ These small black seeds are a common ingredient in the Middle East and India. Nigella seeds are aromatic, slightly bitter and peppery and can be fried before the use to enhance the flavour. They are sometimes used in garam masalas or milder dishes such as kormas. â€¢ In the Middle East and India, nigella seeds are often added to bread dough before baking. â€¢ Try out yours from the link in bio

Today I want to send special holiday thanks and a shout out to Coffee Collective in Torvehallerne! From the girl that took my order that didnâ€™t quite speak Danish (much to my joy as I wasnâ€™t quite sure how to ask in Danish to please grind my beans for a French Press), the other girl that started my hand brew although her shift was over, to the guy that sent her home and took over my order, talked to me about this new coffee that I had ordered and then gave me a taste of their filter coffee of the day so I could really feel and taste the difference between them! SmÃ¸rrebrÃ¸d. Hallernes SmÃ¸rrebrÃ¸d Torvehallerne. Copenhagen. . . . Danish open sandwiches are the epitome of OTT. We got the chicken salad topped with bacon, and Danish meatballs with potato salad. The chicken salad was creamy and rich with plenty of mayo, and served on top of buttered rye bread. The Danish meatballs had a fine but dense constency, similar to meatloaf. Again served with plenty of mayo and buttered bread. I was quick to hop on my bike after this lunch. . . . Price: 70 dkk per SmÃ¸rrebrÃ¸d Taste: 5/10. I'm a big fan of mayo and butter, but I can't help but feel this was too much. Towards the end, I was really struggling.  Experience: 7/10. The stand is in the cute Torvehallerne food hall, buzzing with food, colours and people. Very fun ambiance.  Value: 5/10. Definitely gotta try SmÃ¸rrebrÃ¸d when in Copenhagen, but keep in mind that it's a cold open faced mayo sandwich, so maybe plan something active after :)

There are many goods for eco products lovers, vegans/vegetarians and inveterate meat eaters. And there is a lot of excellent crafting beer and fine wine here. On Copenhagen: Torvehallerne  A glorious foodhall.  Fresh and dried produce, seafood, cooked food, jars of condiments, teas, coffees, pastries, chocolates (the ubiquitous Summerbird) and even handcrafted soaps abound.  The stalls outside mostly sold fresh fruits and vegetables which offered a riot of colours. Good place to spend a few hours.. #thebagchronicles #travel #storiestotell #torvehallerne #copenhagen #food #august2016 #tobecontinued

Kind of a cult place - food market (Torvehallerne on Danish) on Â«Israel PladsÂ» in the center of Copenhagen close to the Â«NÃ¸rreportÂ» station.  The market consists of two glass structures. Authorship of the project belongs to the Danish architect Hans Hagens. Despite its brevity and restraint, it is a vast magical world of gastronomy! I'm hungry for a Torvehallerne smÃ¶rgÃ¥s.  #torvehallerne  #smÃ¶rgÃ¥s.
After a lot of walking, it's time to refresh for good, so we head to Torvehallerne, the main food market in Copenhagen. It is a very recent covered market, consisting of two glass buildings that are full of sellers and buyers every day. The market is the right place to get wrapped up in the scents, colors and flavors of Denmark. Right here we tasted the famous smÃ¸rrebrod, the typical Danish stuffed bread.  . Dopo tanto camminare Ã¨ tempo di rifocillarsi per bene, perciÃ² ci dirigiamo al Torvehallerne, il principale mercato alimentare di Copenhagen.  Si tratta di un mercato coperto molto recente, costituito da due edifici di vetro che ogni giorno sono pieni di venditori e compratori. Il mercato Ã¨ il posto giusto dove farsi avvolgere dai profumi, dai colori e dai sapori della Danimarca. Proprio qui abbiamo assaggiato il famoso smÃ¸rrebrod, il tipico pane farcito danese.  #torvehallerne #torvehallernemarket #torvehallernekbh @torvehallernekbh #streetfood #streetfoodmarket #copenhagen #copenhagenfood @topcopenhagenphotos @copenhagenfood #igerscopenhagen #denmark #denmarkstreet @denmark.online #danimarca #smÃ¸rrebrÃ¸d #danish #wanderlust #travelblogger #travel #travellover #travelgram #travelphotography #globetrotter #globe_travel #igtravel #travelgirl #instatravel #traveleurope

SmÃ¸rrebrÃ¸d - Hallernes SmÃ¸rrebrÃ¸d - SmÃ¸rrebrÃ¸d, the famous open faced Danish sandwich, over the coming weeks Iâ€™ll share a series on smorrebrod to try and capture the variets across Denmark.The Smorrebrod (meaning butter and bread in Danish), consists of a piece of Rye bread, which has been buttered, with Palaeg (topping) placed on the top. The Palaeg often includes, meat, eggs or fish. #kastrupsÃ¸bad is a wooden island on stilts offering some wind protection and the opportunity to jump directly into the deeper part of the baltic rather than wading into the potentially cold sea. In summer, the round fort-like shape creates a lively and crowded atmosphere of people sunbathing, jumping and having a pique-nique. In winter its a solemn location for winter bathers.â € â € How much a few lights can do to turn a wet and cold winter night into #hygge : #torvehallerne on #israelsplads in #copenhagen at night. We could not help but to showcase these so gorgeous tropical veggs and fruits we found in Torvehallerne. We're so used to rough stalls when it comes to gnams, plantains and so on. Not only are they merchandised superbly but on top you can get a freshly squeezed juice out of them. And guess what is even avant-garde Danish style ( apart from the crazy pricing ) ? The possibility to drink fresh sugar cane juice - that is really something to me because I love it so much! Mikkeller IPA brewed by De Proefbrouwerij. Copenhagen, Denmark.  So I'm back with my beers in this year. It has been a while... first Christmas and after laziness stoped me for posting new reviews but I will make it up! I have couple of beers still from trip to Copenhagen.  First is the Mikkeller which I have visit in @torvehallernekbh .  Beer is medium caramel with some light head. Hazy amber and citrus aroma. Hoppy enough and grate balance with bitterness. Very nice and good start of the day.  Taste 8/10 Aroma 7.5/10 Price 30 dkk (3.5 euro) Bottle 0.5 L Alcohol 6.9 %  #beer #pivo #piwo #cerveza #sÃ¶r #Ã¸l #bier #biera #review #reviewer #beerporn #beertography #beerstagraming #mikkeller #ipa #torvehallerne #deproefbrouwerij #laziness  @mikkellerbeer @mikkellertorshavn

Cleaver's Meat Market, located in Torvehallerne, Copenhagen, Denmark.  Cleaver's...what a great name for a meat market!  Torvehallerne is a fabulous indoor food market in Copenhagen.  With over 60 stalls selling everything from fresh fish to high quality chocolate, pizza right from the oven to beautiful flowers, organic produce to exotic spices, this outstanding food market is not to be missed!  You may also stop and have a bite to eat at one of the many vendors....it's hard to decide!  Filled with locals doing their shopping and tourists taking it all in!  #torvehallerne #torvehallernekbh #foodmarket #food #foodie #foodiegram #shop #organic #local #butcher #chocolate #copenhagen #denmark #scandinavia #travel #tourism #vacation #sightseeing @visitcopenhagen #madaboutcopenhagen @torvehallernekbh #produce #fish #foodstalls #quality @govisitdenmark

Mikkeller A Red & White Christmas (8.0%): Lunchbreak in Denmark, it is 1st of December and it is friday (!!), so it is time to find the best X-mas ale (in Denmark). All X-mas beers are rated up against each other in a X-mas category. Tis Mikkeller has a oatmeal/bread-like thickness, altogether with a great balance between the malty and hoppy flavouring with hints of orange peel, giving both a bitter and sweet aftertaste. Great start of the X-mas category! #Beerstyle: X-mas (hybrid of Red Ale and Witbier) #beercause #beerreview #torvehallerne

Hello, a super sweet breakfast in the Torvehallerne market. Actually, we bought this pastry in the nearby bakery - "Naturbageriet". All these buns together costed us ~ 100 DKK, while only 1 bun at the market costed 75 DKK :) They also have vegan or gluten-free options available, which is really nice if you want to try some Danish pastry in those variations :) P.S. After this trip I was actually craving fresh fruits and vegetables sooo badly. In a land obsessed with morning pastries, Lauras takes the cake. Using the classic Danish kanelsnegl (cinnamon bun) as a base, a selection of signature Danish pastries was created. The design here draws on the nostalgia of grandmother's cakes and bread, integrated with the combination of a modern metropolitan vibe with a minimalistic Scandinavian aesthetic.  This is our chokolade snegl (chocolate swirl) and cinnabun snegl (cinnabun swirl). Open-faced sandwiches are a staple of the Danish. Copenhagen being geographically surrounded by water, fresh seafood is inevitable. Here in their modernized glasshouse food market, one may find an assortment of these sandwiches, locally known as Smorrebrod. In addition, thereâ€™s an array of fresh fruit and vegetables in their farmersâ€™ market section. Great day to spend a Sunday. On Copenhagen: Mamma Mia! At Gorm's - purveyor of thin-crust pizzas with inventive toppings. The smell of fresh, wood-fired pizzas was tantalising, and most diners seemed to agree, hence the long queue.  It was nearly a half-hour later before Gorm's Hottie (tomato, mozzarella,  ricotta, green pepper, braised beef mixed with chilli, garlic and parsley, spicy cucumber relish, habanero oil, basil) was served up to 3 hungry humans who promptly devoured 2 slices each. Generous and delicious toppings, pizza crust was crisp, and slightly burned at the edges. One of the better value options in Torvehallerne..... #thebagchronicles #travel #storiestotell #copenhagen #august2016 #italian #pizza #gorms #torvehallerne #tobecontinued

Vi kalder det en skole fordi du ikke bare smager vin, men du lÃ¦rer ogsÃ¥ en masse undervejs og vi hjÃ¦lper dig med at blive bedre til at drikke vin. Vi har kÃ¸rt med konceptet i snart et Ã¥r og der har oftere vÃ¦ret udsolgt end tomme pladser. Det er vi rigtig glade for, for vi elsker at dele vores viden om vin.  Emnerne skifter fra gang til gang og selvom vi har vÃ¦ret godt rundt i vinens verden allerede, er der stadig massere at tage fat pÃ¥ eller vende tilbage til og nÃ¸rde endnu mere. Vi har vÃ¦ret rundt om Bourgogne, Loire, Champagne, Piemonte og mange andre steder. Der er blevet set nÃ¦rmere pÃ¥ produktionsmetoder til fremstilling af bl.a. natur- og biodynamisk vin. Nogle gange har vi haft fokus pÃ¥ Ã©n enkelt anderledes producent vi synes er spÃ¦ndende. Vi har ogsÃ¥ taget jer genneme dyrere vine og champagne for at bedre forstÃ¥ dem. Og vi har udforsket blindsmagnings-disciplinen, smagt orangevin og meget meget mere. Kort sagt har skemaet vÃ¦ret fyldt og det fortsÃ¦tter det med at vÃ¦re.  Vi har mÃ¦rket sÃ¥ stor interesse for Vinskolen at vi tÃ¦nkte det var en oplagt gaveidÃ© til jul. Og bare rolig, alle kan vÃ¦re med uanset niveau, der er ikke noget vinsnobberi her. SÃ¥ mÃ¥ske har du lyst til at forkÃ¦le en der elsker vin, en der aldrig rigtig har prÃ¸vet det fÃ¸r eller mÃ¥ske dig selv? Vi har sammensat en pakke til 500 kr., med en god flaske Ã¸kologisk rÃ¸dvin fra RhÃ´ne, og et kort med 5 klip til Vinskolen, normal vÃ¦rdi 630 kr. - vi synes selv det ser ret flot ud.  Vi glÃ¦der os til at se en masse nye ansigter pÃ¥ skolebÃ¦nken. Programmet for resten af Ã¥ret kan du se pÃ¥ vores Facebook-side. Pakken kan kÃ¸bes i butikken i Torvehallerne og snart pÃ¥ vores webshop. . . . #magnusogsÃ¸n #vinskolen #vinnÃ¸rd #rÃ¸dvin #hvidvin #spanskvin #italienskvin #franskvin #vintip #mousserendevin #vinsmagning #kÃ¦rlighedtilvin #vingÃ¸rglad #orangevin #rosevin #biodynamiskvin #vindyrkning #Ã¸kovin #elskervin #vininspiration #vinoggladedage #vinbutik #naturvin #vinhygge #vinlivet #vinvinvin #vinskole #dejligvin #vintid #torvehallerne

First meal in #Copenhagen was off to a fishy start
#fishandchips #danishfood #copenhagen #torvehallerne  #streetfood #lespapillesalafete
Major throwback to 2011 when I visited Copenhagen for a few days. My friend asked for some tips for CPH but since I hadn't been in such a long time, I didn't feel comfortable suggesting places as they may be totally crap now and/or have shut down. So, I went on a Google rampage and pulled a list together (like I normally would whenever I go on holiday) of places I'd like to stay, eat (most important ), get lashed and grab some culture. Having done this list, I am now majorly craving a revisit to Copenhagen, mostly because the restaurant scene seems so insanely amazing. Beyond Geranium and Noma, there seems to be a whole stable of exciting eateries with talented chefs, working both in the fine dining world and street food scene, many  of whom are alumini of RenÃ© Redzepi, like girl boss Rosio Sanchez, his ex Pastry chef - who went off to create her own taqueria, so the Danes could experience proper tacos - err body deserves tacos afterall - basic human right if you ask me. Full deets live on the blog and there's a map  too. Also, if anyone has their own tips, please do share!

I can't say enough great things about the Torvehallerne here. One building is mostly sweets and the other building is savory. It started raining this morning and this was a perfect way to start it with my $8 breakfast at Granny's House. This is a Hanekam aka a "cocks comb". It's a Danish type of pastry with an almond filling and hazelnuts on the top. Basically = amazing. The pastries and croissants I have had here have topped Paris by a long shot. And it's right up there with Italy. . . .  #hanekam #konditori #denmark #danmark #kopenhaven #danish #pastryiswhatsforbreakfast #chillintheair #fallindenmark #bikingcopenhagen #mytinyatlas #wearetravelgirls #bagsonamission #butfirstespresso #worldtravel #ilovenordic #colderthebetter  #grannyshouse #farmersmarket #Torvehallerne #hygge #foodie

Copenhagen's popular market place Torvehallerne is the best place to look for Danish delicacies,Â local vegetables, fresh fish, or maybe some Italian specialities. Torvehallerne were designed by architect Hans Hagens and opened in September 2011.  One of the key points of Torvehallerne is that they specialise in selling some of the freshest products that arenâ€™t often found in â€˜run-of-the-millâ€™ Â markets. One of the best surprises aboutÂ Torvehallerne is that it actually hasÂ two main halls specialising inÂ different types groceries, small restaurants, take out places, kitchenÂ knickknacks orÂ the most precious of nectars - wine!

One of the must try things in Copenhagen  are the hot dogs from the "traditional "  #streetfood vendors. The first  one in the video was at Nyhavn, the second  in the middle of the city  and the third was an example of the more modern #copenhagen food scene it was at #torvehallerne market and was using organic meat served with a herb sauce. All 3 were delicious in their own and different ways. And the trucks are found all over the city. #copenhagenstreetfood #tasteofireland #copenhagenfood #vistcopenhagen #foodtourist #travel #hotdog  #food #foodporn #foodie  #instafood #yummy #sharefood #instaeat #foodstagram #sweet #yummyfood #foodlovers #amazingfood #foodforlife #tasty #foodpictures #foodlover  #foodie #irishfoodblogger #irishblogger @royalcaribbeanuk #kobenhaven #hygge

We have decided to leave Copenhagen and plant our roots elsewhere, at least for a while. I still have mixed feelings about that decision because I love Copenhagen so much. The food, the bicycle culture, the fact that it is small yet international... So I have decided to share some of the things I love the most over the coming weeks before we pack our things. This is also a welcome excuse to revisit all my favourite places! As a neighbour to @torvehallernekbh I come here, or at least pass through, every day and I will miss them so badly. I am a regular @coffeecollectif not only here but also in their other cafÃ©s, like the new one on NÃ¸rrebro or the main shop in Frederiksberg just below where I used to have an office desk. Their coffee is always perfect, the atmosphere light and airy and the soft ice is just such a treat on a hot day (here with my dear @kette_maa ). #whatiloveaboutcopenhagen #leavingcopenhagen #coffeecopenhagen #torvehallerne #kbhk

Er det ren hype, eller er der noget om snakken?  NÃ¦ste uge tager vi fat pÃ¥ de mest kendte italienske regioner, Piemonte og Toscana. Her dyrkes flotte vine pÃ¥ to vidunderdruer, Nebbiolo og Sangiovese. De kan nemt forveksles, og derfor smager vi dem op mod hinanden og lÃ¦rer at smage forskel, fÃ¸r timen er forbi. â€ Vinskolen varer en times tid og afholdes ganske uformelt i butikken hver Tirsdag. Der smages mindst 3 forskellige vine og serveres lidt brÃ¸d til. Det er muligt at kÃ¸be de smagte vine til ekstra gode priser pÃ¥ dagen. This is a massive selection of organic plant mylk. Copenhagen. I love and respect you for being the health food and organic capital of the world. And I am proud to say that my mega bestselling book from 2008 kickstarted this. Because before my book, glutenfree, organic and dairyfree foods were non-existing in Denmark. You CAN change the world just by changing yourself. My book was about how to transform your family through food & lifestyle. Even the union of dairyfarmers interviewed me about how it felt to have minimized sales of dairy in Denmark. Now, my sons and I can get glutenfree, dairyfree, organic food everywhere. #healthycopenhagen #paleo #glutenfree #dairyfree #organic #copenhahen #torvehallerne

Open-faced sandwiches are a staple of the Danish. Copenhagen being geographically surrounded by water, fresh seafood is inevitable. Here in their modernized glasshouse food market, one may find an assortment of these sandwiches, locally known as Smorrebrod. In addition, thereâ€™s an array of fresh fruit and vegetables in their farmersâ€™ market section. Great day to spend a Sunday.
